feels.name: Remorse
feels.quote: I had been the author of unalterable evils, and I lived in daily fear lest the monster whom I had created should perpetrate some new wickedness.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: I was in the greatest fear lest my fire should be extinguished.

feels.name: Compassion
feels.quote: I was deeply affected by it. If such lovely creatures were miserable, it was less strange that I, an imperfect and solitary being, should be wretched.

causedByEvent.name: Witnessing the unhappiness of the cottagers

feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: Life, although it may only be an accumulation of anguish, is dear to me, and I will defend it.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: The old man returned to the cottage, and the youth, with tools different from those he had used in the morning, directed his steps across the fields.

causedByEvent.name: Witnessing the love and respect between the cottagers

feels.name: Kindness
feels.quote: This trait of kindness moved me sensibly.
